title: Forbidden Dreadnought fears nothing with 154mm travel in a 100% rearward axle path
content:
We first got eyes on Forbidden’s new long travel high-pivot enduro bike at Zermatt EWS last August. Still without a name, their (at the time) team rider Lewis Buchanan raced it, though we were only permitted to photograph it at some very strange angles. Now, we can give you a full view of the Forbidden […]

The post Forbidden Dreadnought fears nothing with 154mm travel in a 100% rearward axle path appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
